title: Most tech gadgets are trash. Here’s how to find one you’ll love.
description: Our gadget nerd gives three rules for deciding which technology products might make your life better and what will wind up in your junk drawer.

title: China’s meddling in Taiwan election presages year of misinformation threats
description: More than half the world’s population lives in countries holding elections in 2024 — an unprecedented test of systems to combat disinformation.

title: Substack’s woes deepen as tech blog leaves over Nazi content
description: One of the newsletter platform Substack’s most prominent writers is abandoning the platform over its decision not to moderate praise for Nazis and pro-Holocaust material.
